sentences.en: Basic information about using macros to automate tasks in the editor.
sentences.cn: 关于在编辑器中使用巨集来自动化工作的基本资讯.

sentences.en: Bill Venners : Sounds like you could actually automate that.
sentences.cn: BillVenners:听起来似乎可以将这个过程自动化.

sentences.en: Cash machines automate two basic functions of a bank - deposits and withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 现金取款机让银行的两个基本职能实现了自动化 --- 存款和取款.

sentences.en: Cash machines automate two basic functions of a bank – deposits and withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 柜员机使银行的两个基本功能——存款和取款自动化了。

sentences.en: Equipping an office or plant with computers to facilitate or automate procedures.
sentences.cn: 给办公室或工厂装备计算机,使办公手续或生产过程更方便或自动化.

sentences.en: He wanted to use computers to automate the process.
sentences.cn: 他想通过计算机实现流程的自动化。

sentences.en: Hire, outsource, and automate in proportion to the growth of your business.
sentences.cn: 雇佣 、 外包和自动化工作要与企业的发展规模相符.

sentences.en: It is simple conceptually and easy to automate.
sentences.cn: 它概念简单并且容易自动化.

sentences.en: It was suggested that we automate our flour mill.
sentences.cn: 有人建议我们把面粉机自动化.

sentences.en: It will manage and automate every aspect of your Private data.
sentences.cn: 软件会管理和自动操作你私人数据的每个方面.

sentences.en: Many banks have begun to automate.
sentences.cn: 许多银行已开始采用自动化技术。

sentences.en: Many plants have begun to automate.
sentences.cn: 许多工厂已开始实行自动化生产.
我的照相机是自动照相机.

sentences.en: Technology would automate many of the pilot's functions.
sentences.cn: (这种新的)技术将使许多飞行员的操作步骤实现自动化.

sentences.en: The workflow technology can be used to automate the business process.
sentences.cn: 工作流技术是一种实现业务过程自动化的技术.

sentences.en: To automate the control process of the lathes has become very easy today.
sentences.cn: 使机床的控制过程自动化现已变得很容易了.

words.tran_cn: 自动的；无意识的；必然的
自动地；机械地；无意识地
自动售货机；[自] 自动机；自动贩卖式餐馆
自动作用；[医] 自动症；自动性
自动机；机器人；自动机器
自动化（automate的过去分词）；自动操作

trans.tran_en: to start using computers and machines to do a job, rather than people
